brands.name: starbucks
brands.reason: Starbucks is an American multinational chain of coffeehouses. Starbucks has opened outlets in US bases in Afghanistan and Iraq and at the illegal torture center in Guantanamo Bay. Starbucks also sponsors fundraisers for Israel https://bdsmovement.net/tags/starbucks

brands.name: cat
brands.reason: The occupation forces use Caterpillar CAT bulldozers to demolish Palestinian homes and bulldoze their farms, and they also used them in the Israeli massacres in Gaza. The company designed a fortified bulldozer specifically for the Israeli army. Manufacturer of CAT clothing and shoes https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EC6C-cAc240

brands.name: ahava
brands.reason: Ahava Cosmetics relies on natural resources illegally extracted from the shores of the Dead Sea in the occupied Palestinian territory. It is one of the most internationally known Israeli exporting companies, as its products are not only sold in stores but are also marketed online and provides delivery service to all Arab countries through its headquarters in Britain. Boycott Ahava and all its products

brands.name: hyundai

brands.name: dominos
brands.reason: Opposition to the location of Domino's stores: Critics of the company may object to the presence of Domino's in Israeli settlements in the West Bank, which are considered illegal under international law by some countries and organizations.

brands.name: burgerking
brands.reason: Burger King in Israel is facing calls for a boycott after it posted photos showing that it was donating free meals to Israeli soldiers amid ongoing fighting with Hamas. https://www.newsweek.com/burger-king-faces-boycott-giving-free-food-israeli-soldiers-1837005

brands.name: axa
